uptake.translation[0].definitions[0].def: the number of people who use a service or accept something that is offered
uptake.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: The uptake of some vaccinations fell as the media stirred up fears of possible side effects.
uptake.translation[0].definitions[1].def: the rate at which a substance is taken into the body, a system etc
uptake.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: the uptake of sugars by the blood
